tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE emissions_data (
  industry_id INT,
  region_id INT,
  emission_year INT,
  carbon_emission FLOAT,
  methane_emission FLOAT,
  nitrous_oxide_emission FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE industry_emissions (
  industry_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  industry_name VARCHAR(50),
  region VARCHAR(50),
  emission_kg DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE region_details (
  region_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  region_name VARCHAR(50),
  country VARCHAR(50),
  population INT
)

CREATE TABLE emissions_data (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  industry_id INT,
  region_id INT,
  emission_date DATE,
  emission_amount DECIMAL,
  FOREIGN KEY (industry_id) REFERENCES industry_emissions(industry_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (region_id) REFERENCES region_details(region_id)
)

CREATE TABLE emissions_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    industry_id INT,
    region_id INT,
    emission_level FLOAT,
    emission_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (industry_id) REFERENCES industry(industry_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (region_id) REFERENCES region(region_id)
);

CREATE TABLE climate_impact (
    impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    data_id INT,
    impact_description TEXT,
    impact_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (data_id) REFERENCES emissions_data(data_id)
);
